titleStmt.title: A letter to Dr. E. Hyde in answer to one of his occasioned by the late insurrection at Salisbury.
titleStmt.author: Ley, John, 1583-1662.
Hyde, Edward, 1607-1659.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Attributed to John Ley. cf. NUC pre-1956.
